skill_e.tooltip: Deals 75/120/165/210/255 (+0.5) Magic Damage to enemies hit and leaves a trail on the ground for 4 seconds, slowing enemies in it by 20/28/36/44/52%.

skill_i.tooltip: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.

skill_q.tooltip:
Passive: Kog'Maw gains 15/20/25/30/35% bonus attack speed.

Active: Launches a corrosive projectile that deals 90/140/190/240/290 (+0.7) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and shreds its Armor and Magic Resist by 20/22/24/26/28% for 4 seconds.

skill_r.tooltip:
Fires an artillery shot, damaging enemies above 40% health for ? to ? magic damage based on their missing health.

If enemies are below 40% health, they take ? magic damage instead.

Each subsequent shot within ? seconds costs ? more Mana (max ?).

skill_w.tooltip: For 8 seconds, Kog'Maw's basic attacks gain 130/150/170/190/210 range and deal 3/3.75/4.5/5.25/6% (+?)% of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage.
